WorkItem.Description:
Hello everyone. When i try to optimize my warr and select 'Talent', the optimize chenge my spec to arms but i have not selected 'Talent spec'. I want to optimize my talents also but i dont want to change spec into arms (im fury). Can any1 tell me what im doing wrong?
Thanks in advance

Comments.Message:
That is expected.  The "talent" optimizer disregards any pre-made spec setup you may have and tries to optimize your gear and each individual talent point to get the best result.
The "Talent Spec" Optimization looks at only the possibly handful of already saved specs you may have available and just optimizes amongst those.
